Population.value: ADULT, CHILDREN, aged 12 to 18 AND weighing at least 40 kg.

AdditionalNotes.value: Recommended for treatment naïve and treatment-experienced, INI-naïve patients.
Recommended for treatment naïve patients when co-administered with potent UGT1A/CYP3A inducers, including efavirenz, tipranavir/ritonavir, fosamprenavir/ritonaviror rifampin.
